text: Pavy may refer to: ==People with the surname== *Amery of Pavy, 14th-century English knight. *Béatrice Pavy (born 1958), French politician. *Felix Octave Pavy (1879-1962), American politician. *Frederick William Pavy (1829-1911), British physician. *Francis X. Pavy (born 1954), American painter and sculptor. *Louis-Antoine-Augustin Pavy (1805-1866), Bishop of Algiers from 1846 to 1866. ==Other== *Pavy Formation, geologic formation in Canada.
title: Pavy
